# Reelables Smart Labels
### The Future of Supply Chain Data Tracking and Visibility
## Revolutionize Track and Trace with Reelables Smart Label Tracking
![](http://reelables.com)
Reelables smart labels automate data collection with real-time visibility into supply chain operations and performance. Our Bluetooth tracking labels actively communicate location, reducing human error and eliminating the need to manually scan inventory or operate complicated tracking devices. 
Paper-thin labels are easy to use for tracking shipments and inventory at the item level, and consistent visibility increases accountability and reduces loss and theft.
Smart label tracking solutions are ideal for companies that want to evolve past standard barcode labeling to gain more data insights and product status visibility for better customer service and efficiency.
[ Contact Us ](http://reelables.com/<https:/reelables.com/contact-us/>)
![Reelables Smart Labels](data:image/svg+xml;charset=utf-8,%3Csvg xmlns%3D'http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F2000%2Fsvg' viewBox%3D'0 0 800 783'%2F%3E)
![Instant Shipment Visibility](http://reelables.com)
#### Real-Time Shipment Visibility
Use our smart label tracking solution to maintain visibility into a shipment’s location wherever it is. Our temperature logging labels add an extra layer of insight, detecting temperature fluctuations and notifying you as they occur.
![Improve Operational Efficiency](http://reelables.com)
#### Improve Operational Efficiency
Save on labor costs and keep things moving faster with automated scanning in the background. Smart label tracking eliminates the need to move inventory through choke points, reduces human error, and facilitates fresh inventory audits every 60 seconds.
![Easy Integration With API or App](http://reelables.com)
#### Easy Integration With API or App
Our all-in-one solution allows you to easily print and attach Reelables paper-thin smart labels. Monitor your shipments through our app or dashboard, or you can set up custom API integrations to work with your existing system.
![Eco-Friendly Materials for More Flexibility](http://reelables.com)
#### Eco-Friendly Materials for More Flexibility
Reelables smart labels are approved for air transport, using an environmentally-friendly Zn-Mn battery coating, which is incorporated within the label. They are disposable in ordinary waste streams, eliminating the need of additional spend for e-waste disposal.
### Are you ready to revolutionize your track and trace system?
[ Download Brochure ](http://reelables.com/<https:/reelables.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/04/Reelables_Timelines-Sales-Lit.pdf>)
## Modernize Your Logistics Operations With Reelables Smart Label Tracking
![](http://reelables.com)
[ ![Bluetooth Tracking Labels](data:image/svg+xml;charset=utf-8,%3Csvg xmlns%3D'http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F2000%2Fsvg' viewBox%3D'0 0 900 650'%2F%3E) ](http://reelables.com/<https:/reelables.com/bluetooth-tracking-labels/>)
#### Bluetooth Tracking Labels
An easy-to-use, automated solution to the track-and-trace challenge. These smart labels actively broadcast a Bluetooth identifier, enabling full stock counts and location of high to medium-value items every minute.
[ Learn More ](http://reelables.com/<https:/reelables.com/bluetooth-tracking-labels/>)
[ ![Temperature Logging Labels](data:image/svg+xml;charset=utf-8,%3Csvg xmlns%3D'http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F2000%2Fsvg' viewBox%3D'0 0 900 650'%2F%3E) ](http://reelables.com/<https:/reelables.com/temperature-logging-labels/>)
#### Temperature Logging Labels
Accurately measure temperature from 0 to 60 degrees Celsius. Automatically transmit data to an easy-to-use app or your management system via API to alert you in time to proactively avoid spoilage and reduce loss.
[ Learn More ](http://reelables.com/<https:/reelables.com/temperature-logging-labels/>)
[ ![NB-IoT Labels](data:image/svg+xml;charset=utf-8,%3Csvg xmlns%3D'http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F2000%2Fsvg' viewBox%3D'0 0 900 650'%2F%3E) ](http://reelables.com/<https:/reelables.com/nbiot-tracking-labels/>)
#### 5G Labels
Track cargo and inventory around the world without deploying any additional infrastructure by using smart tracking labels that work with 5G Narrowband Internet of Things (NB-IOT) radio technology.
[ Learn More ](http://reelables.com/<https:/reelables.com/5g>)
[ ![Reelables](http://reelables.com) ](http://reelables.com/<https:/reelables.com>)
14 Windsor StreetN1 8QGUnited Kingdom

generated_description:
**Reelables: Revolutionizing Supply Chain Data Tracking**

Reelables is on a mission to enhance the future of supply chain data tracking and visibility. With a focus on automating data collection, their smart labels provide real-time insights into supply chain operations. Founded in 2019 and a participant of Y Combinator's W19 batch, Reelables has developed innovative solutions ideal for businesses looking to move beyond traditional barcode systems.

At its core, Reelables offers various smart label products designed to improve tracking accuracy and reduce manual errors. Their solutions feature Bluetooth tracking labels that provide continuous location updates, temperature logging labels that monitor conditions during transit, and 5G capable labels for global inventory management without additional infrastructure.

What's more, these smart labels are paper-thin, eco-friendly, and incredibly user-friendly—making them perfect for tracking shipments and inventory at the item level without complicating the logistic process. The automation capabilities not only save time and labor costs but also facilitate efficient audits, enhancing operational efficiency across various industries including freight forwarding, warehousing, and perishable goods.

Their offering is neatly complemented by an easy integration model, allowing users to monitor shipments via an app or API, aligning seamlessly with existing systems.

Reelables stands out not just for its technology, but also for its commitment to sustainability—a crucial factor in today's market. With backing from industry experts like Brad Flora as their Group Partner, and a vision that challenges the status quo, Reelables is poised to help companies leverage data for better customer service and increased accountability.

For more information, you can visit their website at [reelables.com](http://reelables.com). Ready to revolutionize your tracking system? Reelables seems to be a promising partner in modernizing logistics operations.
